question_text: Which two of the following are required for Windows Hello facial recognition to work properly on a laptop?
answer_options: System UEFI set to Legacy Mode
Biometric feature enabled in Windows settings
A USB-C fingerprint scanner plugged in
correct_answer: Biometric feature enabled in Windows settings
explanation: Windows Hello requires a working IR or compatible camera and that biometric login is enabled in settings. TPM is recommended but not strictly required for local login.
